Data: Morkel to Ponting, 1 run Morkel digs it in short, Haddin gets on his toes and plays it towards backward point
Morkel to Haddin, 1 run length ball on middle and leg, driven firmly to mid-on, batsmen sprint through for a single
Morkel to Ponting, 1 run strays on to the pads, length ball, Ponting shuffles across his stumps and whips that away towards the fielder at fine leg

Morkel to Haddin, FOUR runs ugly-looking shot from Haddin, fetches him four nonetheless, slower ball outside off from Morkel, Haddin gives it the kitchen-sink, the bat turns in his hand as he plays the shot, but it still flies straight down the ground for a boundary
Morkel to Haddin, 1 run Haddin makes room and plays a shortish ball outside off towards third man for a single to retain the strike
Morkel to Haddin, 1 run back of a length, on middle stump, Ponting jumps and defends it towards mid-on
Morkel to Ponting, 1 run similar length, but a touch outside off, Ponting dabs that to third man for a single
Morkel to Haddin, no run good start from Morkel, ties Haddin down with an offstump ball, pitching just short of a length, Haddin blocks it back to the bowler

Morkel to Haddin, 1 run Haddin, as he has so often this innings, backs away from the stumps, Albie saw him and followed him, a yorker into the batsman, squeezed out by Haddin, and the batsmen pinch a single
Morkel to Ponting, 1 run on middle and leg, driven down to long-on by Ponting
Morkel to Haddin, 1 run full on off, Haddin bunts it down the ground towards mid-on, enough time for the batsmen to hustle through for a single
Morkel to Haddin, 2 runs Haddin comes down the track and throws his bat at an offstump ball, doesn't get hold of it, only manages to slice it behind point for a couple
Morkel to Haddin, 1 leg bye comes into the batsmen after pitching short of a length, Haddin doesn't cover for the movement, is hit on the thigh pad
Morkel to Ponting, no run gets forward and jabs it towards point
Morkel to Ponting, no run shortish ball on leg stump, Ponting plays it off his hip towards midwicket, placement isn't too god though
Morkel to Ponting, no run a jaffa from Morne, back of a length again, in the corridor outside off, Ponting fishes for it but is comprehensively beaten
Morkel to Ponting, 1 run on offstump this time, Ponting plays it with soft hands towards mid-off, the batsmen set off for the run immediately and completely it with time to spare
Morkel to Ponting, 1 run good length, draws the batsman forward, played towards extra cover for a single
Morkel to Haddin, (no ball) whoah, Albie completely lost control of that, a no-ball as well, that was way down the legside
Morkel to Haddin, SIX runs not the best ball to bowl on a free-hit, length on middle stump, Haddin backs away and hammers that towards the sightscreen to bring up the first six of the match
Morkel to Haddin, 1 wide wide down the leg side this time from Albie

Morkel to Haddin, 2 runs low full toss this time, Haddin gets it away towards long-on, batsmen decide to come back for two, it's direct hit at the non-striker's end from the boundary, third umpire is called for, but Ponting had made his ground
Morkel to Haddin, 1 run again Haddin decides to walk down the stumps and towrds the leg side, Albie follows him, flicked to midwicket
Morkel to Ponting, 1 run Albie keeps it full, this time on off and middle, Ponting drives firmly to long-on

Morkel to Haddin, FOUR runs Shot! yet again Haddin backs away, Albie doesn't follow him this time, placement is inch perfect on the thrash through the off, bisects cover and extra cover, and that's four
Morkel to Ponting, no run Morne starts with a pearler, that's a length ball pitching just outside off, Ponting goes for the drive but is beaten
Morkel to Ponting, no run this time Ponting gets behind the line and blocks it back to the bowler

Morkel to Ponting, FOUR runs slightly overpitched by Morkel, on middle and leg, Ponting lofts it over mid-on,. timing wasn't particularly good but enough to get it past the fielder and to the boundary

Morkel to Ponting, OUT shorter from Morne this time, Ponting tries to repeat the shot, miscued again, and this time he doesn't beat the fielder at mid-on, Albie Morkel runs back a few yards to complete the catch, and Ponting's got to go
Morkel to Hussey, no run shortish and a touch wide, Hussey is content to let that one through to the keeper
Morkel to Hussey, 1 run length ball on offstump, Hussey gets off the mark with a push wide of extra cover
Botha to Hussey, FOUR runs starts with a very wide ball, a touch short as well, Hussey steers that into the gap behind point and gets a boundary
Botha to Hussey, no run fuller, and turned to midwicket by Hussey
Botha to Hussey, no run on middle and leg, Hussey walks across his stumps, flicks it to midwicket
Botha to Hussey, 1 run a little short, Hussey gets on the back foot, opens the face to guide it to backward point for a single
Botha to Haddin, 1 run speared in towards legstump, Haddin nudges it off his pads for a single
Botha to Hussey, 1 run overpitched outside off, a wristy drive from Hussey has it travelling to long-on
Morkel to Hussey, 1 run starts the over with a wide ball, Hussey drives that uppishly but in the gap between cover and extra cover
Morkel to Haddin, no run full on middle and off, Haddin gets behind the line and defends back to the bowler
Morkel to Haddin, FOUR runs steps towards the leg side, back of a length ball, Haddin flat bats it over the bowler and to his left for a boundary
Morkel to Haddin, 1 wide attempts a split-finger slower ball, drags it down the leg side, that's a wide
Morkel to Haddin, no run much better line, on middle and off, fullish ball, Haddin defends cautiously
Morkel to Haddin, 1 run a bit of room outside off, Haddin guides it down to third man for a single, yet another occasion when he stepped towards leg
Morkel to Hussey, no run keeps Hussey honest with a length ball on off, the batsmen defends it off the front foot
Botha to Haddin, no run played to square leg
Botha to Haddin, no run Botha keeps it on al ength, around middle and off, played back to the bowler
Botha to Haddin, no run a touch outside off, opnes the face to play it toward backward point
Botha to Haddin, 1 run driven firmly toward mid-on, too firmly to take a single
Botha to Hussey, 2 runs Botha drags it a touch short, Hussey sweeps it square, JP Duminy sprints across at midwicket to cut it off
Botha to Hussey, 1 run full and outside off, good use of the wrists from Hussey, he places it wide of the mid-on fielder for a single
Morkel to Hussey, no run length ball, on off, Hussey pushes it towards cover
Morkel to Hussey, no run lovely ball, pitches just outside off, and straightens, Hussey was looking for the drive but is beaten
Morkel to Hussey, no run on middle stump this time, defended off the backfoot towards cover
Morkel to Hussey, no run length ball on off, Hussey drive but it's cut off by Gibbs at short cover
Morkel to Hussey, FOUR runs shortish ball on middle, Hussey goes for the pull, miscued, balloons over Albie Morkel at mid-on, well-timed enough to send it away to the boundary
Morkel to Hussey, 1 run outside off this time, Hussey glides it down to third man for a single
Botha to Hussey, 1 run quicker ball, flat and on middle, Hussey gets behind the line and plays it towards mid-on
Botha to Haddin, no run shorter, Haddin stays on the backfoot and turns it to square leg, no run
Botha to Haddin, 1 run a bit of a it to this one, outside leg, Haddin sweeps it to get off the strike
Botha to Hussey, no run defended towards point, no run for Hussey
Botha to Hussey, 1 run length ball, outside off, Hussey whips it down to long-on
Botha to Haddin, 1 run fourth single of the over to end it, again it is played to long-on, this time by Haddin
Morkel to Haddin, no run starts with a full ball on off, punched towards covers
Morkel to Haddin, no run Albie keeps it full, Haddin drives to mid-off, but too firmly to get a single

Morkel to Haddin, OUT Horrendous, horrendous mix-up, Hussey's run out, Albie sends down a good yorker, Haddin jabs that towards backward point and took one step before deciding against the run, Hussey was charging down and kept running, both batsmen were nearly at the
Morkel to Haddin, FOUR runs a little bit of width from Albie, a delicate shot from Haddin, just helps it on it's way over the vacant first slip for a boundary to bring up his fifty
Morkel to Haddin, 1 run full and straight, driven down to long on
Morkel to Hussey, no run length ball outside off, driven towards mid-on
Botha to Haddin, 1 wide down the leg side, and that's a wide
Botha to Haddin, no run wide outside off, Haddin pads it away
Botha to Haddin, no run about a foot outside off stump, Haddin stays on the backfoot and glides it to short third man
Botha to Haddin, no run turned towards midwicket this time, straight to the fielder
Botha to Haddin, 1 run full toss on legstump, swept behind square for a single

Botha to Hussey, 1 run, OUT What is going on here? Another run out, full outside off, Hussey stretches and steers it towards third man, Haddin sets off for the second, Hussey's not interested, Albie throws it from the deep to Boucher, Haddin is yards out of his crease
Botha to Ferguson, no run a bit of turn for Botha, pitched outside off and came sharply into Ferguson who wasn't expecting the spin, misses the ball
Morkel to Hussey, 2 runs length ball outside off, Hussey goes for the off drive, an inside edge takes it towards midwicket
Morkel to Hussey, no run slower ball, 116.2kmph, Hussey is surprised by that one, manages to tap it down to the bowler
Morkel to Hussey, no run a bit of width, an offcutter from Albie, chopped down to backward point
Morkel to Hussey, 1 wide wide down the leg side
Morkel to Hussey, no run back of a length, slanting towards middle and leg, Hussey defends off the back foot
Morkel to Hussey, 1 run another slower offbreak, 113kph, sliced to third man for a single
Morkel to Ferguson, 1 run length ball outside off, Ferguson walks into a drive, cut off by the sweeper at the boundary
Botha to Ferguson, no run a touch short, spinning in, Ferguson whips it to midwicket, but doesn't beat the fielder
Botha to Ferguson, no run again Ferguson gets it away to midwicket, another dot ball
Botha to Ferguson, no run lot of turn for Botha on this ball, Ferguson misses as he attempts to get it away to the leg side
Botha to Ferguson, no run defended back to the bowler
Botha to Ferguson, no run firmly driven by Ferguson, but Botha gets across to his right to cut it off
Botha to Ferguson, 1 run finally he gets a run, punched to long-on for a single which helps him retain the strike
Morkel to Ferguson, no run Ferguson tries to cut that one from Albie, gets a bottom edge which trickles towards cover
Morkel to Ferguson, no run
Morkel to Ferguson, 1 run full on middle and leg, Ferguson walks across his stumps and gets it away to midwicket
Morkel to Hussey, no run Albie's sending down a lot of slower balls here, 110kmph, overpitched on the pads, Hussey taps it back to the bowler
Morkel to Hussey, 2 runs another slower ball, this is slightly shorter, Hussey works it behind square, pushes for the second and gets it comfortably
Morkel to Hussey, no run wide outside off, goes for a backfoot drive, which ends up at gully
Botha to Ferguson, 1 run pitches well outside off and turns in, Ferguson flat bats it powerfully to the long-off fielder
Botha to Hussey, 1 run full and pitching on off, Hussey gets on the backfoot to whip it toward mid-on
Botha to Ferguson, no run wide outside off, umpire might have thought about calling that calling that one but decides against it
Botha to Ferguson, no run sweeps it to square leg, no run for Ferguson
Botha to Ferguson, no run
Botha to Ferguson, no run Botha goves it a bit of air, Ferguson plays it fine down the leg side, Hussey called for the single, but the batsmen decide not go for it
Botha to Ferguson, 1 run quicker delivery from Botha, clipped off the batsman's toes behind square for a single, brings up Australia's 150
Botha to Hussey, 1 run tossed up, but sliding down leg, Hussey works it to square leg for a single
Botha to Ferguson, no run the doosra from Botha, Ferguson wanted to play it to leg, but gets a leading edge which lands safely
Botha to Ferguson, no run flighted delivery, defended back to the bowler
Botha to Ferguson, no run on a length on middle, turned to mid-on, no run
Botha to Ferguson, 1 run driven firmly, mid-on has to run to his left to cut that one off
Duminy to Ferguson, 1 run Duminy flights it, lands on middle and off, easily turned to midwicket for a single
Duminy to Hussey, no run Hussey stays on the backfoot and chops it towards point, no run
Duminy to Hussey, no run driven by Hussey, Duminy gets across to his right to cut if off
Duminy to Hussey, no run driven to short cover this time, another dot ball, good over so far from Duminy
Duminy to Hussey, 1 run gets a single this time, carted towards long-on
Duminy to Ferguson, 1 wide wide down the leg side
Duminy to Ferguson, 1 run punched to long-on for another single
Steyn to Ferguson, no run short of a length delivery, outside off, no shot offered by Ferguson

Steyn to Ferguson, FOUR runs wonderful shot from Ferguson, it wasn't particularly short but Ferguson gets on the backfoot and cuts that powerfully, wide of Duminy at point and the sweeper can't cut if off either
Steyn to Ferguson, no run good length delivery, defended watchfully by Ferguson
Steyn to Ferguson, no run back of a length, on offstump, Ferguson defends that towards the covers
Steyn to Ferguson, no run short ball from Steyn, Ferguson sways out of the way

Steyn to Ferguson, 1 leg bye slower ball from Steyn to end the over, 126kmh (he's been operating in the mid 140s this over), Ferguson looks to nudge it to the leg side, misses the ball and is rapped on the pads outside off
Duminy to Ferguson, no run tossed up by Duminy, on middle and leg, Ferguson goes for the sweep, hit on the pads, no run
Duminy to Ferguson, FOUR runs lovely drive from Ferguson, gets on the front foot and lashes that through the covers
Duminy to Ferguson, 1 run
Duminy to Hussey, no run shorter from duminy, Hussey stays on the backfoot and pushes it towards mid-off
Duminy to Hussey, 2 runs glanced very fine by Hussey, the batsmen sprint through for two
Duminy to Hussey, no run punched confidently by Hussey, but straight to de Villiers at short cover

Steyn to Ferguson, OUT Steyn strikes, short and pretty wide, Ferguson slashes at it, gets a top edge which flies to Johan Botha at third man, Botha back pedals a few steps to complete that catch, making sure that he doesn't cross the boundary
Steyn to Hussey, 1 wide another bounce from Steyn, Hussey ducks under it, it was down the leg side and the umpire deems it a wide
Steyn to Hussey, no run much fuller and outside off, Hussey dabs it to backward point, straight to the fielder
Steyn to Hussey, no run pitches on off and carries on with the angle, Hussey shoulders arms to that one
Steyn to Hussey, FOUR runs easy pickings for Hussey, Steyn strays onto the pads, tickled fine for a boundary
Steyn to Hussey, 1 run reverts to his offstump line, nicely glided down to third man for a single
Steyn to Hopes, no run a bit wide, Hopes throws his bat at it, firmly hit but placement isn't too good, doesn't beat the man at point
Botha to Hussey, 1 run nicely tossed up by Botha, full, driven down to long-on by Hussey
Botha to Hopes, 1 run drags it short this time, Hopes gets off the mark with a flat batted shot to long-on
Botha to Hussey, 1 run gives it some air again, overpitched on legstump, Hussey works it behind square on the leg side
Botha to Hopes, no run much quicker from Botha, pushed off the backfoot to extra cover
Botha to Hopes, 1 run on middle and leg, whipped to midwicket by Hopes
Botha to Hussey, 1 run he continues to toss it up to the left-hander from around the wicket, Hussey drills it along the ground to the fielder at long-on
Ntini to Hussey, no run starts with a shortish ball, defended with an angled bat by Hussey, the ball bounces at his feet and nearly rolls onto the stumps
Ntini to Hussey, no run similar length, just outside off, Hussey gets on the back foot and jabs it to backward point
Ntini to Hussey, 1 run short and quite wide, lashed to the sweeper at the boundary by Hussey
Ntini to Hopes, no run bowled from very wide of the crease, angling into Hopes, it was a short ball, Hopes gets behind the line and defends
Ntini to Hopes, 1 run much fuller, just outside off, Hopes gets on the front foot and drives down to long-off
Ntini to Hussey, 1 run sharp single from the batsmen, Ntini again bowled from very wide of the crease, Hussey gets an inside edge onto the pad
Botha to Hussey, no run overpitched on legstump, Hussey goes for the sweep, doesn't connect with the ball
Botha to Hussey, 1 run closes the face of the bat to get it away to square leg
Botha to Hopes, 1 run Hopes backs away to make room, and dabs that towards point
Botha to Hussey, no run fullish on middle, driven to the fielder at mid-off
Botha to Hussey, 1 run low full toss on offstump, Hussey gets on the front foot and powers it to long-on
Botha to Hopes, 1 run nudged in front of square leg for a single to end Botha's spell
Ntini to Hopes, no run length ball that was slanting towards middle and leg, Hopes gets across and punches it towards mid-on

Ntini to Hopes, FOUR runs Lovely timing from Hopes, same length from Ntini as the previous ball, but it was around offstump this time, Hopes punched it straight down the ground, hardly any power in the shot but the ball raced away
Ntini to Hopes, no run Hopes backs away and stabs the ball towards point,no run
Ntini to Hopes, FOUR runs ooh! nearly caught behind, Hopes was going for the straight drive but got an outside edge which flew just wide of Boucher
Ntini to Hopes, no run half-volley on legstump, Hopes can't capitalise on it, his whip goes straight to the fielder
Ntini to Hopes, 1 run short of a length outside off, jabbed towards short cover, a quick single is pinched
Morkel to Hopes, no run very full, Hopes finds the mid wicket fielder on the flick
Morkel to Hopes, no run full ball, Hopes turns it to mid-on
Morkel to Hopes, no run on offstump, Hopes carves it behind point, but goes straight to the fielder
Morkel to Hopes, 1 run length ball on middle and off, driven to mid-on for a single
Morkel to Hussey, 1 run another length ball from Albie, Hussey punches it towards long-on for another single
Morkel to Hopes, no run and finishes the over with a length ball just outside off, Hopes goes for the drive but gets an inside edge onto his pad
Morkel to Hussey, no run he's on target straight away, back of a length, on middle and leg, Hussey is pinned to his back foot and he taps it back to the bowler
Morkel to Hussey, no run more towards the offstump this time, driven towards cover by Hussey, another dot ball
Morkel to Hussey, 1 run Hussey stays on the backfoot and plays it behind point with soft hands, 'Yes' he calls immediately, and they're through for a single
Morkel to Hopes, no run again a good length, Hopes steers it towards point but no run
Morkel to Hopes, FOUR runs short and wide, gets the treatment, Hopes throws his bat at that one, and Amla, the sweeper, had no chance of cutting that off
Morkel to Hopes, no run this time Hopes plays it towards extra cover, too firmly to get a single
Morkel to Hussey, 2 runs overpitched outside off, Hussey lashes that towards extra cover, Botha makes a great dive to take the pace off the ball, they still get a couple
Morkel to Hopes, 1 run steady stuff from Albie here, Hopes pushes this one down to long-off for a single
Morkel to Hussey, 1 run fuller on the pads, Hussey gets across and guides it to square leg
Morkel to Hopes, 1 run lovely yorker from Albie, dug out towards point, a tight single is stolen
Morkel to Hussey, 1 run low full toss on offstump, Hussey dismisses it towards long-off, only a single to end the over
Morkel to Hussey, no run Morne gets some steepling bounce, 141 kmph, wasn't particularly short, but it bounced much more than Hussey expected, it sails through to the keeper
Morkel to Hussey, 1 run fuller, Hussey tips it towards mid-on to get off the strike
Morkel to Hopes, 2 runs Morne drags it a bit short, Hopes goes for the pull, not particularly well-timed, Ntini has enough time to come across and cut it off on the square leg boundary
Morkel to Hopes, 1 run similar length from Morne, firmly struck by Hopes, in front of square this time, but only a single
Morkel to Hussey, 1 run pitched up this time, Hussey was looking to drive to the on side, gets an inside edge onto his pads
Morkel to Hopes, 1 run shorter to Hopes, well outside off, Hopes throws his bat at it, the ball speeds away behind square for a single
Ntini to Hopes, 1 run short and outside off again, Hopes cuts that with a flourish, third man is able to cut that one off
Ntini to Hussey, 1 run Hussey was coming down the track, Ntini pitched it shorter, Hussey runs it down to third man for a single
Ntini to Hopes, FOUR runs a length ball, and width is provided, Hopes cashes in, thrashes it through the covers for a boundary
Ntini to Hopes, FOUR runs Ntini goes for the yorker, ends up as a low full toss on legstump, Hopes gets across and guides it to the fine leg boundary, wonderful from Hopes
Ntini to Hopes, 1 run length ball and close to offstump, Hopes punches it towards extra cover for a single
Ntini to Hussey, 1 run yorker on middle stump, Hussey was looking to give the charge, he jabs it into the ground and towards the offside for a single
Steyn to Hussey, 1 run starts with a 146kmph short of length ball, it was close to offstump but Hussey managed to get inside it and dab it to third man to reach his half-century
Steyn to Hopes, 1 run length and outside off, Hopes carves it to the sweeper for a single
Steyn to Hussey, 2 runs Hussey stays on the backfoot and nudges a length ball behind point, he pushes Hopes into coming for a second
Steyn to Hussey, 1 run the angle is allowing Hussey to just open the face of the bat and run it towards third man,
Steyn to Hopes, 1 run wide outside off, Hopes strikes it well, it races across the outfield, but doesn't beat the sweeper
Steyn to Hussey, no run yorker on middle and off, 142kmph, Hussey manages to squeeze it back to the bowler
Morkel to Hopes, 1 run slower back-of-a-length ball, outside off, Hopes again plays it out to the sweeper for a single
Morkel to Hussey, 1 run Hussey looks to back away, Morne follows him, Hussey tips it at his feet and sets off for the single, superb running there

Morkel to Hopes, OUT Hopes is gone, he saw that the fine leg was up, so he walked across the stumps to pick up a middle stump ball and tried to chip it over fine leg, it looked pretty flamboyant but he didn't get enough on it, and Dale Steyn takes a simple catch to end
Morkel to Johnson, 1 run shortish and on the pads, Johnson dabs it square for a single to get off the mark
Morkel to Hussey, FOUR runs overpitched and wide, Hussey backs away and carves that behind point for a boundary, wonderful placement that
Morkel to Hussey, 1 run this one is pitched up, Hussey punches it towards long-off, again he wants the second but the batsmen decide against it
Morkel to Hussey, 1 run hit with conviction by Hussey, Albie tests him with the bouncer, pulled to midwicket for a single
Morkel to Ferguson, no run watchfully plays a fullish ball towards mid-off
Morkel to Ferguson, no run nearly a yorker, on offstump, dug out to short cover
Morkel to Ferguson, 1 run slower ball from Albie, not too well timed a drive from Ferguson, but gets the placement right for a single
Morkel to Hussey, FOUR runs short ball again from Albie, that's wasn't too quick either, 117kmph, Hussey crashes that through midwicket for a boundary
Morkel to Hussey, 1 run a bit of width, Hussey stays on the back foot and jabs it towards backward point for a single
Duminy to Hussey, 2 runs starts off with a full ball that is mistimed to long-on, so poorly timed that they can get two
Duminy to Hussey, no run watchfully defended off the front foot to the bowler
Duminy to Hussey, no run Duminy's giving it a lot of air here, on middle and leg, Hussey dabs it back down the ground
Duminy to Hussey, no run flatter, nearly a yorker, defended off the front foot
Duminy to Hussey, FOUR runs flighted this time, Hussey crunches it through covers for a boundary, superb shot that
Duminy to Hussey, no run Duminy does away with the flight, fires it in towards the base of legstump, Hussey manages to keep it out
Steyn to Hussey, 1 run Steyn sends down a shortish ball, Hussey steers that towards covers for a single
Steyn to Johnson, 1 wide inches away from the legstump, but that's wide enough to be an illegal delivery

Steyn to Johnson, OUT full ball from Steyn, not much footwork from Johnson as he tried to smear it through the offside, gets a faint edge through to the keeper, big appeal from Boucher, Johnson doesn't wait for the umpire's decision and decides to walk
Steyn to Hauritz, FOUR runs scorcher of a delivery first up, 151.1 kmph, that was short, Hauritz manages to get his bat in the way, a thin edge goes past the keeper and runs away for four
Steyn to Hauritz, no run another bouncer, Hauritz hops onto the backfoot and defends, the ball hits bat around face-high, the bottom hand came off as Hauritz defended
Steyn to Hauritz, 2 runs fuller this time, Hauritz nicks it again, this time thick enough for third man to come around and cut it off
Steyn to Hauritz, 1 run length ball outside off, 152kmph, Hauritz jabs it towards point for a single and keeps the strike
Morkel to Hauritz, 1 run Hauritz steers the ball towards point, just as he did in the previous ball, to give Hussey the strike
Morkel to Hussey, FOUR runs superb from Hussey, full and wide of offstump, but Hussey loves hitting it over midwicket and that's where he hits it
Morkel to Hussey, no run similar delivery, pitches behind the stump outside off, Hussey was aiming for mid-on to midwicket again but misses the ball
Morkel to Hussey, no run low full toss again from Morne, Hussey's thrash goes back to the bowler
Morkel to Hussey, SIX runs Shot! another full toss, was a bit higher this time allowing Hussey to get under it, boy did he did that, it goes twenty rows back over long-on
Morkel to Hussey, 1 run another full toss, driven forcefully to long-off by Hussey, the single lets him retain the strike
Botha to Ferguson, 1 run fullish and well outside off, Ferguson plays a paddle sweep for a single
Botha to Hussey, 1 run length ball on offstump, Hussey gets across his stumps and turns it behind square on the leg side
Botha to Ferguson, 1 run dabbed in front of point for a single
Botha to Hussey, no run forcefully driven towards extra cover, a diving de Villiers doesn't give away any runs
Botha to Hussey, 1 run
Botha to Ferguson, 1 run played with soft hands towards point, nicely done by Ferguson, that's another single
Duminy to Ferguson, 1 run quicker one down the legside, Ferguson sweeps it fine for a single
Duminy to Hussey, 1 run played to fine leg for another single
Duminy to Ferguson, 2 runs Ferguson gets on the front foot and drives it uppishly towards long-off, placed to the left of the fielder, and they get a couple
Duminy to Ferguson, no run an ugly, forcing shot which is mistimed back to the bowler
Duminy to Ferguson, no run driven with more conviction back to the bowler
Duminy to Ferguson, 1 run overpitched on middle and leg, whipped behind square for a single
Steyn to Hussey, no run shortish and wide, 146kmph, Hussey tried to crash that past point, doesn't connect, lucky to get away with that one Steyn
Steyn to Hussey, FOUR runs a bit fuller from Steyn, Hussey moves to the leg side, hits it over cover, Duminy gives chase but can't cut it off
Steyn to Hussey, 1 run yorker length ball, just outside off, Hussey powers it to extra cover for a single
Steyn to Hauritz, no run dot ball, shortish, holds it line after pitching just outside off, Hauritz can't get any bat on that one
Steyn to Hauritz, 1 run short and wide from Steyn, Haurotz throws his bat at it, gets a top edge which balloons towards Ntini at third man, but it lands well short and goes on the bounce to Ntini
Steyn to Hussey, no run superb yorker, 145kmph, on middle and leg, cramped Hussey for room, and he can only stab it back to the bowler, that means Hauritz will be on strike when the final over starts
Ntini to Hauritz, FOUR runs slow full toss outside off, seemed to have fooled Hauritz, but he manages to toe end it, it races away fine for a boundary
Ntini to Hauritz, 1 run this one is on a length, but wide enough for Hauritz to free his arms, he slaps it to the sweeper for a single

Ntini to Hussey, SIX runs he needn't have bothered, that was a massive six, it was a short of length ball, pitching middle and angling away, Hussey gets on the front foot and gets under that one, absolutely hammered over long-on, even bigger than the previous six

Ntini to Hussey, 1 run low full toss well outside off, Hussey doesn't care, he's going to smash everything between long-on and midwicket, doesn't get hold of it this time, lobs towards mid-on, Albie dives but can't get there in time
Ntini to Hauritz, FOUR runs another low full toss, Hauritz slams it down the ground, so straight that the fielder can't get round to cut it off
Ntini to Hauritz, 2 runs chipped inside-out this time by Hauritz, that fetches him a couple, Hauritz has played a good hand here, 20 off 11 balls
This is Siddarth Ravindran, with Raju doing the scoring. We'll be back in a bit for the chase.
It's still a pretty good pitch to bat on, and this should be a cracking contest, particularly with Smith v Johnson at the top.
For South Africa, Johan Botha was immaculate again, the quick bowlers were impressive early on but leaked too many at the death.

So Australia finish with a respectable 286. Michael Hussey has had a bit of a rough time lately, but he was back at his best today. There were plenty of cameos as well to help Australia recover from a slow start. Brad Haddin was scratchy but got some valuable runs at the top,
Smith and Amla stride out. Amla to face the first ball from Johnson
Johnson to Amla, no run Full and moves a touch inwards, Amla plays an elegant flick, but straight to square leg, no run
Johnson to Amla, 1 wide whoah, that was very wide outside off
Johnson to Amla, no run back of a length, on offstump, Amla gets back and defends solidly towards extra cover
Johnson to Amla, no run fuller and just a bit of width for Amla, a forceful square drive, doesn't beat Michael Clarke at point, that was 147kmph
Johnson to Amla, no run good line from Johnson, in the corridor outside off, Amla watchfully shoulders arms to that one
Johnson to Amla, no run this came back in a long way, Amla didn't have too much of a clue about that, rapped on the pads, that was a touch too high though
Johnson to Amla, 1 run fullish from Johnson this time, Amla mistimes a drive towards mid-on to get a single and keep the strike
Bracken to Amla, no run starts off with a ball that angles across Amla, who doesn't offer a shot and watches it through to the keeper
Bracken to Amla, no run and again, this time closer to the offstump, Amla gets on the front foot but lets it go again
Bracken to Amla, 1 run shorter from Bracken, Amla quickly hops onto the backfoot and lashes that behind point for a single
Bracken to Smith, no run back of a length, pitching outside off and goes on with the angle, Smith plays inside the line and is beaten
Bracken to Smith, 1 run similar line from Bracken, Smith walks across the stumps and nudges it behind square leg for a single
Bracken to Amla, no run length ball from Bracken, Amla tries to crash it through covers but doesn't beat the field
Johnson to Smith, 1 run that was a wild delivery, low full toss going down leg, Smith gets some bat on it, guiding it to fine leg for a single
Johnson to Amla, 1 run this was wide outside off, Amla flashes at it, it flies uppishly towards third man, where the fielder runs across to his right to cut it off
Johnson to Smith, no run Smith defends it cautiously to the leg side
Johnson to Smith, FOUR runs tests him with a short ball, Smith isn't worried about the fingers he had broken, he hooks Johnson off the front foot for a boundary
Johnson to Smith, 1 run fuller on middle and leg, Smith taps it wide of mid-on for a single
Johnson to Amla, 1 wide this time Johnson strays down the leg side, Amla has a swish at it but doesn't connect, that's deemed a wide
Johnson to Amla, no run much better from Johnson to end the over, just short of a length, slanting across Amla, who slaps it towards cover
Bracken to Smith, 1 run fullish and on middle and leg, driven to mid-on by Smith for a single
Bracken to Amla, FOUR runs length ball on the pads, Amla is on to it in a flash, whips it away to the square leg boundary

Bracken to Amla, OUT Amla's walked, extraordinary scenes here, it was wide outside off, Amla opened the face to glide it to third man, it goes through to the keeper, who barely appeals, there's a half-hearted shout from first slip as well, Amla didn't wait for the verdi
Bracken to Gibbs, no run length ball, on offstump, Gibbs gets forward and defends awkwardly
Bracken to Gibbs, 1 run opens the face and steers the ball to third man, works that one with the angle to get off the mark
Bracken to Smith, no run cautiously prodded towards cover by Smith, no run there
Johnson to Gibbs, no run fullish delivery from Johnson, square driven by Gibbs, straight to the fielder at point
Johnson to Gibbs, no run slower ball from Johnson, 127kmph, Gibbs was initially interested in that one but withdraws his bat at the last moment
Johnson to Gibbs, no run length ball, angling across Gibbs, he gets forward and defends it towards cover
Johnson to Gibbs, no run same length, but this time Johnson has it headed for middle and leg, Gibbs had to make a late adjustment to nudge the ball towards square leg
Johnson to Gibbs, FOUR runs poor ball from Johnson, short and wide, Gibbs says thank you very much and slams it uppishly through point for a boundary
Johnson to Gibbs, no run Johnson comes back with a peach, just a bit of movement into Gibbs, who offers a half-hearted forward defence, but is beaten
Bracken to Smith, no run angled into the pads, flicked towards midwicket, straight to the fielder, no run there
Bracken to Smith, no run full on middle and leg, Smith gets on the front foot and defends back to the bowler
Bracken to Smith, no run punched towards the covers, that's another dot ball
Bracken to Smith, FOUR runs Bracken sends it down at 123kmph, Smith wanted to force that past mid-off, gets an outside edge and the ball goes too fine for third man to cut it off
Bracken to Smith, 2 runs another edge for Smith, this time he wanted to get it towards midwicket, but the ball flies towards extra cover
Bracken to Smith, 1 run played with more conviction by smith this time, Bracken drops it slightly short, Smith gets on the back foot and nurdles it behind square leg
Johnson to Smith, no run big appeal for lbw, that was overpitched and hit Smith on the pads, but that was slanting down the legside
Johnson to Smith, no run driven to mid-off by Smith
Johnson to Smith, no run a wild heave from Smith, a slow bouncer from Johnson, Smith was through with the shot before the ball arrived
Johnson to Smith, FOUR runs Johnson searching for the yorker, but ends up as a half-volley on legstump, Smith dispatches it to the square-leg boundary
Johnson to Smith, no run Johnson shifts his line to outside off, Smith punches that towards covers, doesn't get it past the field
Johnson to Smith, no run length delivery around offstump, Smith pushes it back past the bowler and mid-off has some fielding to do
Bracken to Gibbs, no run Gibbs misses out on a legstump half-volley, he tried to whip that to sqaure leg but misses and is hit on the pads

Bracken to Gibbs, 2 leg byes another legstump ball, shorter this time, Gibbs gets some bat on it and it runs away fine on the leg side , Haddin and Michael Hussey make the long chase to retrieve the ball
Bracken to Gibbs, FOUR runs bang! smashed over the covers by Gibbs, that was fullish, and he took a big stride and smashed it, it was in the air and didn't beat the cover fielder by much
Bracken to Gibbs, no run a bit of movement into the batsman for Bracken, pitching about a foot outside off, Gibbs shoulders arms to that one
Bracken to Gibbs, no run similar ball, just a touch closer to the batsman, and Gibbs decides to offer his front foot defence to that one

Bracken to Gibbs, no run Bracken keeps pegging away around that offstump, Gibbs leaves that one alone, replays suggest there could have been a faint nick, but there wasn't much of an appeal from the Australians
Laughlin to Smith, 2 runs shortish ball, and a bit of width, Smith slaps it towards deep backward point for a couple
Laughlin to Smith, no run slanting across Smith, who gets on the front foot and defends it carefully
Laughlin to Smith, 1 run pushed to the offside with soft hands for a quick single
Laughlin to Gibbs, no run Gibbs gets behind the line of that one and defends
Laughlin to Gibbs, 1 run back of a length, on offstump, Gibbs defends it towards extra cover off the backfoot
Laughlin to Smith, 1 run walks across the stumps and turns it to square leg for a single to end the over
Bracken to Smith, FOUR runs overpitched and very wide from Bracken, Smith cracks that through the overs for a boundary, superbly timed by Smith
Bracken to Smith, no run shimmies down the wicket, whips an outside off delivery towards the leg side, no run though
Bracken to Smith, no run length ball, and a bit of width, crunched towards short cover by Smith
Bracken to Smith, 1 wide very wide from Bracken, Smith chases after it but doesn't make contact, the umpire deems it a 'wide'
Bracken to Smith, 1 run fullish ball again, Smith gets a big stride in and bunts it towards mid-off for a single that brings up South Africa's fifty
Bracken to Gibbs, no run outside the offstump, Gibbs shuffles across the stumps and defends it back down the pitch
Bracken to Gibbs, no run slanting across Gibbs, who decides to let that one go through to the keeper
Laughlin to Smith, no run slower ball, 111.4 kmph, good length, angling across Smith, who goes for the booming drive but doesn't connect
Laughlin to Smith, 1 run short ball this time, on middle and leg, Smith swivels as he pulls that to fine leg, only a single for a lot of effort
Laughlin to Gibbs, FOUR runs Shot! that was on a length, Gibbs comes down the track, plays it on the up, an inside out drive over the infield
Laughlin to Gibbs, 1 run similar delivery, Gibbs gets a thick inside edge towards square leg
Laughlin to Smith, 1 run shuffles across the stumps and nudges it behind square leg for a single
Laughlin to Gibbs, no run pitched up, Gibbs was again looking for the big drive, mistimes it towards the fielder at cover
Bracken to Smith, 1 run wide, length ball, Smith is content to drive away from the body, he slaps it through the covers
Bracken to Gibbs, 2 runs cheeky from Gibbs, that was lap swept from outside off, it's was running away very fine, Laughlin makes good ground and throws in a dive to keep the batsmen to two
Bracken to Gibbs, 2 runs tries to mow a short ball to midwicket, he toe ends and it swirls in the air but lands beyond the fielder running back from midwicket
Bracken to Gibbs, 1 run Gibbs gets a big stride in as drives towards mid-off for a single
Bracken to Smith, FOUR runs Smith shows Gibbs how to heave the ball toward midwicket, it was back of a length, Smith gets on the front foot, and slams it in front of deep midwicket
Bracken to Smith, 1 run slower ball from Bracken, deftly played towards third man by Smith, who has raced along to 36 off 34
Laughlin to Smith, 2 runs Laughlin again starts the over with a slower delivery, 113kmph, Smith looks to drive, gets an outside edge which trickles away fine, fetches Smith two
Laughlin to Smith, no run Smith starts moving away from the stumps early, Laughlin fires in a yorker which lands just outside off, Smith tries to squeeze that to point, doesn't get any bat on it
Laughlin to Smith, no run slower ball again, 113kmph, ends up as a high full toss, pushed back to the bowler by Smith
Laughlin to Smith, 1 run Smith gets forward and opens the face of the bat, steers it to square third man for a single
Laughlin to Gibbs, no run keeps it around the offstump, played plays it towards point
Laughlin to Gibbs, 1 run full on middle and leg, Gibbs drives it towards mid-on for a single
Hopes to Gibbs, no run starts off with a length ball on offstump, Gibbs square drives it forcefully, but placement is poor, straight at the fielder
Hopes to Gibbs, no run goes for a sweep from outside off, but gets beaten
Hopes to Gibbs, 1 run shortish from Hopes, a short-arm jab from Gibbs takes the ball behind square leg for a single
Hopes to Smith, 1 run Hopes keeps it steady, length ball around offstump, Smith plays with soft hands towards mid-off and the batsmen steal a single
Hopes to Gibbs, 1 run similar ball to Gibbs, he dabs it behind point for a single
Hopes to Smith, FOUR runs Smith carves it inside out over extra cover for a boundary, again wonderful timing from Smith
Laughlin to Gibbs, FOUR runs pitched up by Laughlin, Gibbs takes a leaf from Smith's books, beautifully timed cover drive which beats the man to the rope
Laughlin to Gibbs, FOUR runs this time it's the placement which catches the eye, it was a low full toss on legstump, Gibbs flicks it away to the boundary, bisecting midwicket and square leg
Laughlin to Gibbs, no run bouncer from Laughlin, Gibbs goes for the pull but doesn't make contact with the ball
Laughlin to Gibbs, no run defended towards point by Gibbs this time
Laughlin to Gibbs, 1 run overpitched on middle and leg, Gibbs gets on the front foot and turns it away towards midwicket
Laughlin to Smith, 1 wide Laughlin grunts as he sends down a bouncer, it's way over Smith's head and wqas down leg side, easy call for the umpire
Laughlin to Smith, no run slower ball, 110kmph, to end the over, Smith plays it cautiously towards cover
Hopes to Gibbs, 1 run back of a length and a bit of width, Gibbs stays in his crease and pushes it towards covers for a single
Hopes to Smith, 1 run much closer to the stumps this time, similar length though, Smith taps it towards mid-on for a single

Hopes to Gibbs, OUT Gibbs falls, not exactly the best of deliveries, short if a length and outside off, Gibbs throws his bat at that, hits it very well but Michael Clarke at point takes a good diving catch, that's the breakthrough Australia needed
Hopes to de Villiers, no run
Hopes to de Villiers, 1 run de Villiers gets off the mark with a flick behind square for a single
Hopes to Smith, no run length ball on offstump, Smith gets on the front foot and looks to defend, gets an inside edge towards backward square leg
Johnson to de Villiers, no run starts off with a length ball on off, Smith defends off the backfoot
Johnson to de Villiers, 1 run slower ball from Johnson, de Villiers turns it towards midwicket for a single
Johnson to Smith, 1 run fullish and fast, 142.2kmph, nearly managed to get it between bat and pad, Smith gets an inside edge on to his pads
Johnson to de Villiers, no run holds back the length a bit, outside off, de Villiers strokes it to point

Johnson to de Villiers, OUT de Villiers goes lbw, Asoka de Silva rules de Villiers out, there was a big inside edge on that one, it was a back of a length delivery, hit his pads in front of middle but there was bat involved before the ball hit pads, de Villiers can't b
Johnson to Duminy, 1 run full and slanting into the pads, 144kmph, Duminy gets off the mark by nurdling it towards square leg
Hauritz to Duminy, no run big appeal off the first ball, nicely tossed up, drifts in andd straightens, that was a close call
Hauritz to Duminy, no run defended watchfully off the front foot
Hauritz to Duminy, no run
Hauritz to Duminy, 1 run short and a touch wide, turned awqay from the batsman, cut towards point for a single
Hauritz to Smith, 1 run Smith walks across the stumps to sweep Hauritz fine, that will fetch him a single
Hauritz to Duminy, 1 run this time Duminy sweeps, he also picks up a single
Hopes to Duminy, no run Hopes starts the over with a back of a length ball just outside off, driven off the back foot to mid-on
Hopes to Duminy, no run lovely shot from Duminy for no runs, smashed straight down the ground and it crashes into the stumps at the non-striker's end
Hopes to Duminy, no run that ball was pretty close to the body, Duminy decided to go for the cut anyway, doesn't get hold of it
Hopes to Duminy, no run
Hopes to Duminy, 1 run opens the face and runs it to third man for a single
Hopes to Smith, no run good end to a good over, length ball and keeps it tight, just around off, smith defends it down the ground
Hauritz to Duminy, 1 run looks to turn it to the leg side, gets an edge and the ball squirts away towards point
Hauritz to Smith, 1 run flatter this time from Hauritz, Smith gets on his knee and slog-sweeps it to midwicket
Hauritz to Duminy, no run another leading edge for Duminy, this time he comes down the track to on-drive, and the ball balloons towards mid-off
Hauritz to Duminy, 1 run Duminy stays on the backfoot and cuts it behind point for a single
Hauritz to Smith, 1 run chopped powerfully past point for a single
Hauritz to Duminy, no run Duminy waltzes down the track and looks to defend, he is hit on the pad
Hopes to Smith, no run Hopes keeps pegging away at a good length, this time on middle and leg, smith pushes it towards short midwicket
Hopes to Smith, no run similar ball, Smith again prods it towards short midwicket, Laughlin does the fielding
Hopes to Smith, 1 run gives himself room to play the full ball, gets himself a single that brings up his fifty
Hopes to Duminy, 1 run length ball and Duminy pushes it to mid-on for a single
Hopes to Smith, 1 run Hopes holds back the length a touch, Smith delicately glides it to third man for a single
Hopes to Duminy, 1 run short ball on the legstump, a flamboyant pull from Duminy, but the placement isn't very good, straight to man at deep square led and he only gets a single
Hauritz to Duminy, 1 run Duminy gets a big stride in and sweeps towards fine leg
Hauritz to Smith, no run defended watchfully off the backfoot by Smith
Hauritz to Smith, 1 run Smith goes for the sweep again, gets a top edge which loops out of reach of the keeper
Hauritz to Duminy, 1 run Duminy has also decided to combat Hauritz with the sweep, this time he gets a single
Hauritz to Smith, no run

Hauritz to Smith, OUT Smith falls, big wicket for Australia, Hauritz hasn't been afraid to toss the ball up and he gets his reward, Smith was looking to play to the on side, gets a leading edge which results in a simple caught and bowled
Hopes to Duminy, no run Hopes continues his water torture, the same length, just outside off, Duminy chops it towards points
Hopes to Duminy, 1 leg bye on the pads this time, Duminy tips it to the leg side and the batsmen steal a single
Hopes to Boucher, no run Boucher defends watchfully off the backfoot, that was hopes again on a length around off
Hopes to Boucher, no run and again, no room for the batsmen to work with whatsoever, Boucher stabs it towards point
Hopes to Boucher, no run this time it a touch wide, Boucher drives away from his body, towards extra cover
Hopes to Boucher, no run yorker, around offstump, Boucher squeezes it out towards point
Hauritz to Duminy, no run Duminy tries to sweep a wide outside-off ball, it was too slow for him, he was nearly through with the shot before the ball came on
Hauritz to Duminy, 1 leg bye fullish on the legs, Duminy misses out on a chance to get some runs, he is struck on the pads outside leg
Hauritz to Boucher, no run short and turning into the batsman, Boucher plays it towards square leg
Hauritz to Botha, no run a wristy drive towards mid-on first up from Botha
Hauritz to Botha, no run Botha walks across the stumps and plays it towards midwicket this time
Hopes to Duminy, no run driven to mid-on, no run
Hopes to Duminy, 1 run a bit of width for Duminy he flashes at it, gets it away to third man for a single
Hopes to Botha, no run bouncer from Hopes, Botha didn't spot it early, he just about managed to evade it
Hopes to Botha, 1 run dabbed towards point, a bit of confusion in the calling but the batsmen make it safely
Hopes to Duminy, no run driven back to the bowler by Duminy, no run
Hopes to Duminy, no run full and on middle and off, Duminy punches it to mid-on this time but there's no run to be had
Hauritz to Botha, 1 run a touch short from Hauritz, Botha gets on the backfoot and gets it away to square leg
Hauritz to Duminy, 2 runs Duminy sweeps towards midwicket for a couple
Hauritz to Duminy, no run full ball, nicely flighted, duminy is hit on the pads, hawkeye says that would have spun to hit offstump, didn't look out to the naked eye though
Hauritz to Duminy, no run
Hauritz to Duminy, no run
Hauritz to Duminy, 2 runs cut away to deep point for a couple of runs, another good over from Hauritz
Hopes to Botha, FOUR runs lovely straight drive from Botha, he took it on the up and timed it beautifully, straight down the ground for four
Hopes to Botha, no run Hopes keeps it on a length, pegs away at offstump, driven back to the bowler
Hopes to Botha, 1 wide bouncer down the leg side, Botha goes for the pull but misses
Hopes to Botha, 1 run full and wide, mistimed towards extra cover by Botha, the batsmen steal a quick single
Hopes to Morkel, no run goes for the pull but mishits it towards point
Hopes to Morkel, 1 run pushed off the front foot towards cover for a single
Hauritz to Morkel, no run tossed up on a length and thats driven back toward Hauritz
Hauritz to Morkel, FOUR runs there's a positive stroke, he picks the wide delivery and drives superbly into the gap in the covers and the sweeper cannot cut it off
Hauritz to Morkel, no run tossed up, gets some dip, pushed off the front foot to cover
Hauritz to Morkel, 1 run short ball, he gets back and cuts it out to the sweeper
Hauritz to Botha, 1 run pitches on the stumps, tucked away towards the fielder
Hauritz to Morkel, no run flighted just outside off stump and he defends it to point
Johnson to Botha, no run pitched up outside off stump, no shot offered by Botha

Johnson to Botha, OUT ripping short delivery gets Botha! Johnson steams in and bangs in a brute of a short one that fairly kicks up off the track and though an airborne Botha rears his head out of harm's way he cannot drop the hands in time and the ball kisses his glov
Johnson to Morkel, no run very full outside off stump, Morne drives and misses
Johnson to Morkel, 1 run pitches outside leg stump and he flicks it past square leg
Johnson to Morkel, 1 run pitches on a tight line and he dabs it away for one
Johnson to Morkel, no run slided down leg stump, brushes the pads to Haddin
Hauritz to Morkel, no run slow delivery, drifts down leg stump, watchfully patted back
Hauritz to Morkel, no run wide of off stump and turning away, no shot offered
Hauritz to Morkel, no run quicker one on the stumps and he pushes it to the off side
Hauritz to Morkel, no run flights it on a length, off stump or thereabouts, and Albie defends
Hauritz to Morkel, 1 run fuller, flatter, and clipped out to the man at deep midwicket
Hauritz to Morkel, no run pitches outside off stump, he goes back and dabs it past point
Johnson to Morkel, no run back of a length and outside off, Albie swings and he misses
Johnson to Morkel, 1 run much closer to the stumps, Albie dabs it towards point for a single
Johnson to Morkel, no run slips in the bouncer, very short, goes past shoulder high for the 6'6" Morne
Johnson to Morkel, no run a bit fuller this time, and it's Morne turn to swing and miss
Johnson to Morkel, no run slower ball this time, 128kmph, on a length and heading for offstump, Morne defends cautiously
Johnson to Morkel, no run back to usual speed, 144.1kmph, Morne tries to clip it off his legs, misses and is hit on the pads
Hauritz to Morkel, 1 run Albie stays on the backfoot and deftly places it wide of the slip for a single
Hauritz to Morkel, 1 run too short from Hauritz, Morne rocks back and hits it to mid-on
Hauritz to Morkel, no run defended back down the pitch by Albie off the backfoot
Hauritz to Morkel, FOUR runs very short from Hauritz, Albie capitalises, swings it hard over wide mid-on for a boundary
Hauritz to Steyn, 1 run a wristy shot takes an outside off ball towards midwicket

Laughlin to Steyn, OUT starts off yet another of his overs with a slower ball, full ball and pretty wide, Steyn was onto his shot early, checks and can only spoon it to Michael Hussey at short cover, that's Laughlin's first wicket in ODIs
Laughlin to Ntini, no run short ball, well outside off, Ntini leaves that one alone
Laughlin to Ntini, no run another slower ball, fuller this time, Ntini defends off the front foot
Laughlin to Ntini, no run back of a length, offstump line, another exhibition of Makhaya Ntini's front-foot defence
Laughlin to Ntini, no run Laughlin fires in the bouncer, Ntini manages to get out of the way
Laughlin to Ntini, 2 runs fullsih ball just outside off, Ntini carves it through covers for a couple

Hauritz to Morkel, OUT this match is over, Australia have walloped South Africa by 141 runs, another flighted delivery from Hauritz, very full, Morne tries to slam it over mid-on, doesn't quite get hold of it, it goes high and gives Laughlin at mid-on a catch , Hauritz
This is Siddarth Ravindran signing off, thanks to everyone for your mails. See you on Sunday.
So the trend of the results following the same pattern as in the series in Australia continues. Join us to see whether it extends to Sunday's game in Centurion as well.
Both captains say the timing of the Powerplays is proving to be a bit of a headache.
Ponting also says the wickets was slower than he expected, and is full of praise for Hauritz.

Australia had also struggled initially when they batted but they managed to string together a bunch of partnerships, something South Africa were unable to do. Australia bowled well but a number of South African wickets were soft dismissals In hindsight, Boucher at No. 6 seems

South Africa have received an absolute hiding here, the introduction of Nathan Hauritz completely transformed the game. None of the batsmen were really comfortable against him, who was unafraid to toss the ball up and got the rewards. James Hopes also did a sterling support j
Australia won by 141 runs
Player of the match is Michael Hussey, AUS
